idle: Hover over button or label for help
button_cpu: Display CPU usage statistics for cluster
label_running: Number of running jobs on current cluster
label_pending: Number of pending jobs on current cluster
label_jobworker: Status of background thread monitoring # of run/pen jobs
label_sshworker: Status of background thread monitoring SSH connection
label_selworker: Status of background thread monitoring PID selections
label_username: Filter queue by user name (leave empty for all users)
label_search: Filter queue by custom word search. Click label for ANY/ALL mode
label_fontsize: Change the fontsize for queue window
button_savepref: Store current settings, auto loads next startup
